name: Pitcheswara Rao KAMINENI
education: BEng-MetalE(Karnataka), MTech-MetalE(KanpurIIT), PhD(MadrasIIT), MCIMMP, CEng(India), MIE(India), MIIM, MPMAI(India), MASTM, MIEM(HK)
research interest: Current position: Professor and Associate Head

Associate Professor / University Senior Lecturer / Principal Lecturer / Senior Lecturer, Dept. of Mechanical and Biomedical Engineering (formerly with department of Manufacturing Eng. & Eng. Management), City University of Hong Kong
